targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, state) (max_over_time(zfs_pool_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool"}[$__range]))
max by(instance, zpool) (last_over_time(zfs_pool_vdevs{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"}[$__range]))
max by(instance, zpool) (last_over_time(zfs_pool_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"}[$__range]))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_devsize_replaceable{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__range]))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_physical_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__range]))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_ashift_configured{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__range]))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__range]))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (
  max_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__range])
  and
  (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_unsupported{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__range]) == 0)
)

options.content:
L2ARC vdev is not tracked by the exporter,
and ZFS doesn't expose separate per-pool statistics for L2ARC.

targets.expr:
max by(instance, zpool) (
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="online"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 2
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="offline"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 3
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="removed"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 4
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="degraded"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 5
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="faulted"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 6
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="suspended"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 7
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="unavail"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 8
)

min by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(min_over_time(zfs_vdev_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

min by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(
  max_over_time(zfs_vdev_fragmentation{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval])
, "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(rate(zfs_vdev_scan_processed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(rate(zfs_vdev_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="read"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(rate(zfs_vdev_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="write"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(rate(zfs_vdev_ops{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="read"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(rate(zfs_vdev_ops{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="write"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

panels.description: Includes queue and disk read itself. Missing if there were no operation.

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(max_over_time(zfs_vdev_zio_latency_total_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="read", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

panels.title: read latency p99 (zio)

panels.description: includes queue and disk read itself. Missing if there were no operation.

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(max_over_time(zfs_vdev_zio_latency_total_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="write", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

panels.title: write latency p99 (zio)

panels.description: includes only disk operation. Missing if there were no operation.

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(max_over_time(zfs_vdev_latency_disk_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="read", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

panels.title: read latency p99 (disk)

panels.description: includes only disk operation. Missing if there were no operation.

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(max_over_time(zfs_vdev_latency_disk_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk", type="write", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]), "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)"))

panels.title: write latency p99 (disk)

targets.expr:
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(
  ((min_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_unsupported{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 10)
  or
  min_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval])
  , "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)")
)

min by (instance, zpool, vdev, path) (
label_replace(
  (
    max_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_processed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval])
    /
    (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_estimated_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval]) != 0)
  )
  and
  (min_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path=~"$disk"}[$__rate_interval]) < 4)
, "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)")
)

sum by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(
  rate(zfs_vdev_trim_processed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__rate_interval])
  and
  (min_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_unsupported{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path!="", vdev=~"$vdev", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval]) == 0)
  , "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)")
)

panels.description: Empty, unless trim ran in time range. Requires a custom recording rule

targets.expr:
avg by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (label_replace(
  clamp_min(
    # We are evaluating at the end of an interval but we need to calculate average
    # so we need to add a correction to the time() function.
    time() - $__interval_ms / 1000 / 2 - (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_action_time{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval]) != 0) > 0
    or
    # for the very first and last points (time-interval/2 < zfs_vdev_trim_action_time), we need to handle it as a special case
    timestamp(zfs_vdev_trim_action_time{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path=~"$disk"})
  - (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_action_time{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval])!= 0)
  , 0
  )
  *
  (
    (avg_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_estimated_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval]) != 0)
    /
    (avg_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_processed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval]) != 0)
    - 1
  )
  and
  (min_over_time(zfs_vdev_trim_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path=~"$disk"}[$__interval]) <= 1)
, "path", "$1", "path", ".*/([^/]*)")
)

panels.title: trim: estimated remaining time
